Trade/Device Name(s): BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System Ertapenem (0.0625-8 μg/mL)
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Specimen Type(s): Pure culture isolates of Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria
Pure culture isolates of Gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BD Phoenix™M Automated Microbiology System Ertapenem panel for automated MIC antimicrobial susceptibility testing of Gram-negative and Gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for in vitro quantitative determination of antimicrobial susceptibility by minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of most Gram-negative aerobic and facultative anaerobic bacteria isolates from pure culture for Enterobacteriaceae and NonEnterobacteriaceae and most Gram-positive bacteria isolates from pure culture belonging to the genera Staphylococcus, Enterococcus and Streptococcus.
